Text to display in the widget header. Change using msg.title.

Info text to display in (i) pop-up. Change using msg.popup_info.

Change using msg.enabled.

Change using msg.color.

Value shown in the number field. Change using msg.payload.

Minimum value. Change using msg.min.

Maximum value. Change using msg.max.

Step size. Change using msg.step.

Show thumb label when using slider. Change using msg.thumb_label.

Show tick marks. Change using msg.ticks.

Show vertical slider instead of horizontal. Change using msg.vertical.
